importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date of the news article, indicating when the incident occurred and when public awareness of the event was raised.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The incident occurred in 2025, placing it in the current year and highlighting a recent surge in public incidents related to flamethrower use for pest control.

keyTakeAways: A woman in her 20s in Osan, South Korea, attempted to kill a cockroach using a homemade flamethrower made from a lighter and flammable spray, which ignited items in her apartment and caused a fire.
The fire led to the death of a Chinese national woman in her 30s who fell from the fifth-floor window during an evacuation attempt amid thick smoke.
The woman’s husband survived and escaped to the neighboring building, while the woman fell and died from smoke inhalation or injuries.
Eight other residents suffered smoke inhalation as a result of the fire.
The incident underscores the dangers of using improvised flamethrowers to eliminate pests, a practice popularized by social media.
Police in Osan are investigating and may seek an arrest warrant for negligence in starting a fire and causing death.
The building has 32 residential units and commercial shops on the first floor, indicating a shared residential-commercial structure with potential for wider safety risks.

summaryOfNewsArticle: A woman in her 20s in Osan, South Korea, attempted to kill a cockroach using a homemade flamethrower made from a lighter and flammable spray, which caused a fire that spread through her apartment. The fire resulted in the death of a Chinese national woman in her 30s, who fell from the fifth-floor window during a failed escape as smoke blocked the stairway. The woman's husband escaped safely, while the baby was handed to a neighbor. Eight others suffered smoke inhalation. Police are considering charges for negligence in starting the fire and causing death. This incident highlights the dangers of using improvised flamethrowers, a practice popularized by social media, and raises global concerns about unsafe pest control methods, as seen in a similar 2018 case in Australia.
title: South Korea: Woman trying to kill cockroach burns down apartment
